dict.acceptation: 意识到的；知道的；觉察到的；

sent.orig: Winston became aware of silence, as one becomes aware of a new sound.
sent.trans: 温斯顿发现四周一片沉寂。就好像你突然发现听到一种新的声音一样。

sent.orig: In the last few years, context-awareness has attention. It includes position-aware, device-aware, etc.
sent.trans: 近年来，上下文感知成为了一个广泛关注的热点，其中包括位置感知，设备感知等多个方面。

sent.orig: She seems aware that he is staring at her and lowers her gaze abruptly.
sent.trans: 那年轻女人代乎察觉到他在注视着她，便突然垂下了眼睛。

sent.orig: But after he finished repairing, he was aware of his mistake right away.
sent.trans: 但他一完成修理，立刻就意识到他犯了一个错误。

sent.orig: Nim settled himself in the witness chair, aware that his presentation would be long and arduous.
sent.trans: 尼姆在证人席上坐定，意识到他的陈述将是又长又费劲的。
